title: LOST vs. Person Of Interest: The Ultimate Comparison (SPOILERS)
author: FringeMusic107
comment: this is awesome! you obviously know these shows well :) i really like how you compare them--made me notice things i hadn't noticed before. well done, I hope you make more!

There are a lot of catch phrases in Person of Interest, outside of The Brotherhood.
Some examples:

- "You can call me Root"
Awesome video. Really enjoyed it! You have skill, mister.
Just started watching Lost cause of this video and realized both shows have a scene with a psych-ward patient named Lenny
description:
Welcome to LOST vs. Person Of Interest: my second video in a "VS" series! Unlike the previous installment (Dexter vs. Breaking Bad), I did not have a definitive winner in mind for this video as I'm a huge fan of both shows. That means you can take the conclusion with a grain of salt - the "winner" kept on switching, depending on the ridiculous categories I decided to include. In case it's not obvious already; yes, the scenes and categories were specifically selected to show the contrast between the two shows. Have fun, enjoy and beware of spoilers!

Side note; this video was finished before the series finale of Person Of Interest.
